{"id":848539630,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1669200248,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"45 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/848539630/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"32.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n=nums.size();\n        if(n==0) return -1;\n        vector<int> left(n,0);\n        vector<int> right(n,0);\n        left[0]=nums[0];\n        right[n-1]=nums[n-1];\n        for(int i=1;i<n;i++){\n            left[i]=nums[i]+left[i-1];\n            right[n-i-1]=right[n-i]+nums[n-i-1];\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            if(left[i]==right[i]){\n                return i;\n            }\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
